Card.cardDescription:
Title: Heaven's General
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Lightning Strike: Whenever you play or use a DODGE, you may choose another target hero and perform a judgment: 1. If the result is a SPADE suit, you deal 2 Lightning damage to that hero. 2. If the result is a CLUB suit, you deal 1 Lightning damage to that hero and gain 1 health.
Dark Magic: Whenever a hero performs a judgement, you may take the judgement card and replace it with a BLACK card from your hand or equipment zone. The judgement is resolved with the new card.
Amber Sky: (Emperor Ability) Once during the main phase of a KINGDOMLESS faction hero's turn, the KINGDOMLESS faction hero may give you a DODGE or LIGHTNING card.

Title: Noble Warlord
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Random Strike: During your main phase, you may play 2 cards of the same suit from your hand and treat it as you playing HAIL OF ARROWS.
Bloodline: Your maximum hand size is increase by X, where X is 2 times the number of other surviving KINGDOMLESS faction heroes.

Title: Archenemy
Health/Gender: 8M
Ability:
Drown in Wine: You may use a SPADE suited card from your hand as WINE.
Garden of Lust: When a FEMALE hero plays an ATTACK on you, it can only be cancelled by 2 DODGE and vice versa.
Collapse: At the end of your turn, if you are not the hero with lowest health, you must either lose 1 life or lose 1 unit of max health.
Tyrant: (Emperor Ability) Whenever another KINGDOMLESS faction hero deals damage, you may have that hero perform a judgement; if the result is BLACK, you gain 1 health.

Title: Miracle Physician
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
First Aid: Whenever it is not your turn, you may play RED cards from your hand and equipment zone as a PEACH.
The Book of Green Vesicle: Once during your main phase, you may discard a card from your hand and choose a target hero, that hero gains 1 health.

Title: Embodiment of Force
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Matchless: Whenever you are the source of an ATTACK, the defending hero needs to play 2 DODGE cards in order to cancel the ATTACK. Whenever you are involved in a duel, the other hero needs to discard 2 ATTACK cards in order to respond to your discarded ATTACK.

Title: Unrivalled Dancing Princess
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Wedge Driving: Once during your main phase, you may discard a card and choose 2 target MALE heroes. If you do, this is treated as one of them playing a DUEL on the other. (You pick the hero which initiates the DUEL.)
Eclipse: At the end of your turn, you may draw a card.

Title: Devil General
Health/Gender: 6M
Ability:
Swagger: Whenever a hero plays a RED ATTACK and deals damage to you, that hero may gain 1 health or draw a card.

Title: Ever Increasing Ambition
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Arrogant: At the beginning of the Emperor's turn, you may draw 1 card. If you do, the Emperor's hand limit is reduced by 1 until the end of turn.
All in same boat: Whenever another hero plays an ATTACK and you are within that hero's attack range, if the number of cards in your hand is greater than your current health, that hero can only choose you as the target of any ATTACK.

Title: Priest of Tai Ping
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Bewilder: Once during each hero's main phase, you may announce a basic or non-delay tactics card name and play a card face down. This card is treated as the announced card. Before resolving the effects of your announced card, any hero may choose to doubt you and declare that the name of the announced card does not match the name of the card you have played face down; if any hero doubts you, reveal the face down card immediately. If the name of the revealed card is different from what you have announced, cancel the card's effects and discard it. If the name of the revealed card is the same as what you have announced, resolve the effects of the card and the hero who doubted you gains the [HAUNTED] ability.
[HAUNTED]: You cannot doubt cards played by [BEWILDER]. If your health is equal to 1, all your abilities except [HAUNTED] cannot be triggered or activated.

Title: Rider and Ride As One
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Horsemanship: The physical range you see other heroes is reduced by 1.
Fierce Attack: Whenever you play an ATTACK targeting a hero, you may discard a card from that hero's hand or equipment zone. If the discarded card was an equipment, this ATTACK cannot be cancelled by a DODGE. If the discarded card was not an equipment, that hero take this ATTACK card into their hand.

Title: Tiger and Wolf brothers
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Dual Heroes: At the beginning og your draw phase, you may choose to skip your draw and perform a judgment; reveal the judgment card and take it into your hand. Until the end of your turn, you may play cards in your hand with opposite color to the revealed card as a DUEL.

Title: Cold-Blooded Advisor
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Perfect Murder: During your turn, if a hero is on the brink of death; only you and that hero may use PEACH cards.
Upheaval: (Limited Ability) During your main phase, each hero other than you must choose to play an ATTACK targeting another hero closest in attack range to them or lose 1 health.
Shroud: You cannot be the target of BLACK tactics cards.

Title: The Mysterious Transcendent
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Incarnation: At the beginning of the game, you randomly take 2 unused hero cards as [INCARNATION], reveal them and declare one to be active. You only gain 1 ability from the active [INCARNATION]. (Emperor, Awakening, and Limited Abilities are excluded.) Your gender and faction become the gender and faction of the [INCARNATION].
At the beginning and end of your turn, you may replace your active [INCARNATION] with another one and gain 1 ability from the new active [INCARNATION].
Rebirth: Whenever you are dealt damage, for each damage, gain 1 random [INCARNATION] from the unused hero cards.

Title: Lonely Dame in Foreign Lands
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Song of Lament: Whenever a hero is dealt damage by an ATTACK, you may discard a card from your hand or equipment zone and perform a judgment.
If the result is: HEART: The defender gains 1 life. DIAMOND: The defender draws 2 cards. CLUB: The source of damage discards 2 cards. SPADE: The source of damage flip their hero card.
Sorrow: The hero who killed you loses all abilities for the rest of the game.

Title: Ever-Victorious Warrior
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Fearless Charge: Once during your main phase, you may clash with a target hero; if you win, until end of your turn, you ignore the effects of any armor equipment on that hero, ignore any attack/physical range requirements for cards you play targeting that hero, and you may play any number of ATTACK cards targeting that hero. If you did not win, you cannot play ATTACK cards until the end of your turn.
Prohibition: Your WINE cards are considered as ATTACK instead.

Title: Upright and Heroic
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Brilliant Scheme: Once during yout main phase, you may give 1 equipment card or ATTACK card to a target hero, that hero then chooses one of the following: 1. The target hero is considered to have used an ATTACK tageting another hero of their choice within their attack range. 2. The target hero draws a card.
Late Response: Whenever you are dealt damage outside of your turn, you ignore all effects from ATTACK and non-delay tactics card until the end of this turn.

Title: Ruler of Jiang Nan
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Self-Preservation: During your draw phase, you may draw X additional cards. If you do, cards you play this turn cannot target other heroes. (X is the number of factions in play)
House of Royalty: Your hand size is increased by X. (X is the number of factions in play)

Title: Stand Aloof From Affairs
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Anxious Fear: At the beginning of each other hero's turn, if you are damaged, you may clash with the current turn hero. If you win, that hero may only play cards that target themself until the end of turn. If you lose, the physical range between the both of you is considered 1 until end of turn.
Plead for Help: When you become the target of an ATTACK, you may choose a target hero other than the attacker. The target hero may give you a DODGE card. If the target hero does not, they become the additional target of the ATTACK.

Title: Demonic Advisor
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Annihilate: At the end of your turn, you may deal 1 damage to a target hero (other than you) with no cards in hand.
Exterminate: Once during your main phase, you may put one BLACK tactics card on top of the deck and target a hero with cards in their hand, that hero must either discards a tactics card, or discard 2 cards from his hand or equipment zone.
Burn the City: (Limited ability) During your main phase, you may target each other hero. Each targeted hero in sequence must choose one of the following: 1. Discard 1 + X cards from hand or equipment zone. (X is the number of cards the previous player has discarded.) 2. You deal 2 fire damage to that target hero.

Title: Military Schemer
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Progressive Strategy: Whenever you play a card during your main phase, if the card you play has the same rank or suit as the previous card you have played this turn, you may draw a card.
Aiming the North: Whenever you are dealt damage, if it was the first time you are dealt damage this turn, you gain 1 health; if it was not the first time you are dealt damage this turn, you lose 1 health.

Title: Queen of Jin Zhou
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Eavesdrop: At the end of each other hero's turn, if they have not played a card that targeted a hero other than themself this turn, you may choose one of the following: 1. You take a card in that hero's equipment zone into your equipment zone. (You cannot replace a equipment from an occupied slot) 2. You draw a card. (This can be activated even if that hero only played cards that target all heroes.)
Cession: (Limited Ability) During your main phase, you may give all cards in your equipment zone to another target hero, that hero chooses one of the following: 1. You gain X health. 2. You deal 1 damage to X target heroes within that hero's attack range. (X is the number of cards you chose to give to that hero)

Title: The Shady Warlord
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Disloyalty: Once during your main phase, you may reveal all cards in your hand. If they are not the same color, you discard all cards of one color, then choose X target heroes and take a card from each of their hand or equipment zone into your hand. (X is the number of cards you discarded.)
If you put 2 or more cards into your hand, you lose 1 health.

Title: The Ferocious Dual
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Reckless Assault: At the beginning of your main phase, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, your hand size becomes X this turn. (X is the amount of damage you deal this turn.)
Cover Up: Whenever you need to play a DODGE, you may choose to let the current turn hero draw a card, if that hero is not among heroes with the highest amount of cards in hand, you discard a card from a target hero's hand. The target hero must be among the heroes with the highest amount of cards in hand.
(If there is a draw among heroes with the highest amount of cards in hand, you may choose one of them to discard from.)

Title: The Benevolent Ruler
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Peacekeeping: Once per main phase, if the number of cards in your hand is greater than your current health, you may target a hero with you in their attack range; unless that hero plays an ATTACK targeting you, that hero gives you an equipment card from their equipment zone to your hand.
Ancestral Blessing: At the beginning of the game, you increase your max health by X. (X is the number of factions in game.)
If all heroes of a faction are removed from the game, you reduce your max health by 1.

Title: The Powerful Eunuch
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Creating Chaos: You may announce a basic card or non-delay tactics card name, then play a card in your hand as that card. You cannot announce the same name for [CREATING CHAOS] for the rest of the game. After the card's effect is resolved, you target another hero and that hero chooses one of the following: 1. That hero gives you a card from their hand or equipment zone which is not the same type as the announced card. 2. You lose 1 health and cannot use [CREATING CHAOS] for the rest of the turn.

Title: Spreading Aid Throughout the Nation
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Righteousness: At the end of your turn, if you don't have any [RICE] cards attached to you, you may draw 2 cards and attach 2 cards from your hand or equipment zone onto your character face-up as [RICE] cards. When you remove the last [RICE] card you gain 1 health.
Make Known: When you deal or are dealt damage, the hero who was dealt damage may put a [RICE] card into their hand per damage received.
Rice Road: When a player performs a judgment, you may replace the revealed judgement card with a [RICE] card. The new card becomes the judgment result.

Title: The Great Graceful Scholar
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Discourse in Praise: Whenever you play or become the target of another hero's SPADE card, you may take a card from the top of the deck and attach it to you hero as a [BOOK]. (max. 4) Each [BOOK] card increases your hand size limit by 1.
Extensive Communication: At the end of your draw phase, you may swap any number of [BOOK] cards with the cards you own. If your [BOOKS] cards are one each suit, give all your [BOOK] cards to another target hero.

Title: The Devoted Empress
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Guard the Empress Seal: When you become the target of an ATTACK, you may announce the name of a basic or tactics card. Unless the attacker discards the card you announced and takes 1 card from your hand or equipment zone, the ATTACK is cancelled. (You may only announce each card name once per game.)
Benifit the Nation: At the end of your turn, you may draw X cards. (X is the number of players who has less cards in hand than their current health) Then you reveal X cards from your hand and select a target hero. Starting from that hero, each other hero in sequence takes 1 of the revealed cards.
